channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How much you can make as an information security analyst in each state
item.description: Washington, New York, and Iowa pay top dollar for information security analysts—up to $148,000 in annual salary.

item.title: Saudi Aramco offers nearly $11.5 billion in new stock for sale
item.description: Aramco will offer 1.545 billion shares in a price range between 26.70 and 29 Saudi riyals per share on Sunday.

item.title: Trump’s DJT stock price tumbles following guilty verdict in hush-money case
New York jury finds Trump guilty on all 34 felony counts in hush-money trial
item.description: A New York jury found him guilty of falsifying business records in a scheme to illegally influence the 2016 election through hush money payments to porn actor Stormy Daniels.

item.title: Trump's Republican megadonors shrug off his guilty verdict
item.description: Donald Trump and the RNC raised over $76 million combined in April. Trump's guilty verdict won't sway Republican megadonors like Andy Sabin and Steve Schwarzman

item.title: Even with guilty verdict, Trump unlikely to be put behind bars before election
Three Black men sue American Airlines, saying they were kicked off their flight after a random complaint about body odor
item.description: The lawsuit alleges that the men were ejected from the plane "without any valid reason, and solely based on their race."

item.title: Trump guilty on all 34 counts in hush money trial, historic first for a former U.S. president
item.description: Donald Trump reimbursed Michael Cohen for the $130,000 in hush money paid to porn star Stormy Daniels before the 2016 election.

item.title: Trump guilty on all 34 counts in N.Y. hush-money trial
Hopes of a 10-year EV transition are ‘irrational’ pipe dreams because we don’t have enough battery materials—opening up a single copper mine takes 23 years
item.description: An expected copper shortage and mining industry dynamics are threatening to stop the EV transition in its tracks.

item.title: MongoDB shares sink 23% after management trims guidance
item.description: CEO Dev Ittycheria cited slower-than-expected cloud database consumption growth during the quarter, which led MongoDB to lower its fiscal 2025 guidance.

item.title: Costco beats profit and sales forecasts, but stock pulls back from record highs
Alexander Wang dropped a wild ad featuring doppelgängers for Taylor Swift, Beyoncé, and Kylie Jenner—'this video is diabolical'
item.description: Among the TikTok stars featured are Paige Niemann, Taylor Madison, and Ashley Leechin, who resemble Ariana Grande, Kylie Jenner, and Taylor Swift.

item.title: Dell shares fall despite growing AI server business
item.description: Dell reported first-quarter earnings on Thursday that beat analysts' estimates for earnings and sales.

item.title: Gap’s stock jumps 20% as the retailer swings to profit and raises guidance
